enumLongDescriptions.EUI: This durable name shall be the hexadecimal representation of the IEEE-defined 64-bit Extended Unique Identifier as defined in the IEEE's Guidelines for 64-bit Global Identifier (EUI-64) Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.FC_WWN: This durable name shall be a hexadecimal representation of the World Wide Name format as defined in the T11 Fibre Channel Physical and Signaling Interface Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.NAA: This durable name shall be a hexadecimal representation of the Name Address Authority structure as defined in the T11 Fibre Channel - Framing and Signaling - 3 (FC-FS-3) specification.
enumLongDescriptions.NQN: This durable name shall be in the NVMe Qualified Name format as defined in the NVN Express over Fabric Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.NSID: This durable name shall be in the NVM Namespace Identifier format as defined in the NVN Express Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.UUID: This durable name shall be the hexadecimal representation of the Universal Unique Identifier as defined in the Internation Telecom Union's OSI networking and system aspects - Naming, Addressing and Registration Specification.
enumLongDescriptions.iQN: This durable name shall be in the iSCSI Qualified Name format as defined in RFC 3720 and RFC 3721.

Identifier.description: This type describes any additional identifiers for a resource.
Identifier.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional identifiers of a resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DurableName.description: This indicates the world wide, persistent name of the resource.
DurableName.longDescription: This property shall contain the world wide unique identifier for the resource. The string shall be in the format described by the value of the Identifier.DurableNameFormat property.

DurableNameFormat.description: This represents the format of the DurableName property.
DurableNameFormat.longDescription: This property shall represent the format of the DurableName property.

IndicatorLED.deprecated: This definition has been moved to the unversioned namespace so that external references can pick up changes over time.

enumLongDescriptions.Blinking: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a blinking state where the LED is being turned on and off in repetition.  If this value is not supported by the service, the service shall reject PATCH or PUT requests containing this value by returning HTTP 400 (Bad Request).
enumLongDescriptions.Lit: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a solid on state.  If this value is not supported by the service, the service shall reject PATCH or PUT requests containing this value by returning HTTP 400 (Bad Request).
enumLongDescriptions.Off: This value shall represent the Indicator LED is in a solid off state.  If this value is not supported by the service, the service shall reject PATCH or PUT requests containing this value by returning HTTP 400 (Bad Request).

Location.description: This type describes the location of a resource.
Location.longDescription: This type shall describe the location of a resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Info.deprecated: This property has been Deprecated in favor of new properties defined in Resource.v1_3_0.Location and Resource.v1_5_0.Location.
Info.description: This indicates the location of the resource.
Info.longDescription: This property shall represent the location of the resource.

InfoFormat.deprecated: This property has been Deprecated in favor of new properties defined in Resource.v1_3_0.Location and Resource.v1_5_0.Location.
InfoFormat.description: This represents the format of the Info property.
InfoFormat.longDescription: This property shall represent the format of the Info property.

ReferenceableMember.description: This is the base type for addressable members of an array.
ReferenceableMember.longDescription: Array members can be referenced using the value returned in the @odata.id property which may or may not be a dereferenceable URL. The @odata.id of this entity shall be the location of this element within an Item.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MemberId.description: This is the identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: The value of this string shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Resource.description: This is the base type for resources and referenceable members.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

title: #Resource.v1_1_5
